title: Decision of the Management Board of Europol of 5 June 2003 agreeing to the conditions and procedures laid down by Europol adapting the amounts mentioned in the Appendix to the Decision of the Europol Management Board of 16 November 1999 regarding taxes applicable to salaries and emoluments paid to Europol staff members for the benefit of Europol
header:
Decision of the Management Board of Europol
of 5 June 2003
agreeing to the conditions and procedures laid down by Europol adapting the amounts mentioned in the Appendix to the Decision of the Europol Management Board of 16 November 1999 regarding taxes applicable to salaries and emoluments paid to Europol staff members for the benefit of Europol
(2003/C 152/06)
THE MANAGEMENT BOARD OF EUROPOL
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Protocol drawn up on the basis of Article K.3 of the Treaty on European Union and Article 41 (3) of the Europol Convention, on the privileges and immunities of Europol, the members of its organs, the deputy directors and employees of Europol(1), and in particular Article 10 thereof,
Whereas:
(1) The Council decided on 5 June 2003 to adapt the salaries and emoluments for Europol officials with 4,4 % with retroactive effect as of 1 July 2002.
(2) The Management Board decided on 5 June 2003 to effect an increase in the amounts mentioned in Article 4 of the Appendix to the Decision of the Management Board of 16 November 1999(2) by the same percentage and as of the same date as determined by the Council Decision of 5 June 2003 mentioned under point 1.
(3) In accordance with the same decision of the Management Board of 5 June 2003 the values thus established should be published in the Official Journal of the European Union.
main_body: This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Union.
This Decision shall enter into force the day following that of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at The Hague, 5 June 2003.
N. Tasiopoulos
Chairman of the Management Board
(1) OJ C 221, 19.7.1997, p. 2.
(2) OJ C 65, 28.2.2001, p. 8.
